title: My mom always says I’m not smart but when I say that I am smart in a certain subject she says I’m being cocky. Why does she do this? - Quora

response.answer_text: My mom always says I’m not smart but when I say that I am smart in a certain subject she says I’m being cocky. Why does she do this? I guess she’s afraid you’ll get a swelled head. Or maybe the two of you are just into a competition of who is smartest. Not a good idea for a good relationship. Focus on living rather than on proving to her (and yourself) that you’re smart. Your question demonstrates intelligence. You’re fine and don’t need her approval. She’ll never give it anyway. I’m sorry about that, because we all want our mother’s approval. I know, because I desperately sought it but never got it from mine.
This is one of the few times I say don't listen to your mother. Perhaps her parents treated her the same way. Everybody is not a good parent. Remember this.
